document_data.title: The Bargain
document_data.author: [[Elaine Cunningham]]
document_data.realm year: [[1363 DR|1363]] or [[1364 DR]]The web article "Presenting...Seven Millennia of Realms Fiction" dates this short story to [[1362 DR]]. This cannot be the case since the events of "The Bargain" take place just a few months prior to the novel ''[[Elfsong]]'', which is set in [[1364 DR]].
document_data.mainbody: '''"The Bargain"''' is a short story by [[Elaine Cunningham]] included in the 1993 anthology ''[[Realms of Valor]]'', and reprinted in the 2007 anthology ''[[The Best of the Realms III]]''. The story features characters from Cunningham's [[Songs & Swords]] series.
document_data.Summary:
This short story takes place between the novels ''[[Elfshadow]]'' and ''[[Elfsong]]''.

[[Arilyn Moonblade]] and [[Danilo Thann]] are sent on a mission to warn Pasha [[Balik]], one of the warlords vying for the throne of [[Tethyr]], of a plot on his life, but find themselves stalked by [[assassin]]s in turn.
